sentences.sentence: To work sillily get the besotted result only, it can't be controlled by your mind, you cannot get what you want.
sentences.translation: 糊里糊涂地做事只有糊里糊涂地结果，是不能被你控制的，你得不到你想要的结果。

sentences.sentence: Seeing your smile, I will pursue sillily and sillily , hear your voice, I will enjoy silently , your everything, really such a my sight from side to side.
sentences.translation: 看到你的笑容，我会痴痴地追寻，听到你的声音，我会静静地享受，你的一切，真的那样的左右了我的视线。
